entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 12:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 80.5 km
Humidity: 55 %
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
